name: The Breakup
description:
The Breakup Press Run Game, then F to full screen!

A short game about friendship and self-discovery, created in Ren'Py for Ace Jam, 2022.

You and Casper have known each other since middle school. You know him better than you know yourself, but he's been growing more distant and more unhappy these past few months and doesn't seem to have realized it. So when he calls you in the middle of the night to tell you he needs your help, you know you'll do everything you can to help him make it through the roughest night he's been through in a long, long time.

How To Play
  • Click, space-bar, or enter will advance the text
  • Click or use the arrow keys and enter to pick dialogue options
  • The mousewheel and the page-up button can rewind the text
Downloads

While you can play the game in the browser, the downloads allow for easier saving/loading and higher resolution.

Content Warnings

This game contains themes of aphobia and toxic relationships, but has a happy ending. More specific details (including spoilers) are given within the game.
